TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CrossAppDomainDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Used by <xref:System.AppDomain.DoCallBack%2A> for cross-application domain calls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Every derived class of <xref:System.Delegate> and <xref:System.MulticastDelegate> has a constructor and an `Invoke` method. See the C++ code example given in the description for <xref:System.Delegate>.
